description.value:
By placing an offering and praying for a response, you become placed in contact with a deity or a deity’s servant. You ask a single question about a specific goal, event, or activity to occur within 7 days. The GM offers a truthful reply. The reply might be a short phrase, a cryptic rhyme, or an omen.
    However, the spell doesn’t take into account any possible circumstances that might change the outcome, such as casting of additional spells or the loss or gain of a companion.
    If you cast this spell two or more times before finishing your next long rest, your GM rolls a 1d4. Depending on how many times the spell has been cast, the chance of it failing goes up.
    The spell returns a random reading on a roll of 1 on the 2nd casting, 1 or 2 on the 3rd casting, 1-3 on the 4th casting, and automatically returns a random reading on the 5th+ casting.

materials.value: 15gp worth of religion-appropriate offerings, which the spell consumes
